excerpt: Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information Effective date: 2026-01-05 WhiteKnight Academy…
content:
Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information

Effective date: 2026-01-05

WhiteKnight Academy is operated by TheBroda sp. z o.o. (“we”, “us”, “our”). This page explains how California residents (and other users, where applicable) can opt out of the sale or sharing of personal information for cross-context behavioral advertising under the California Consumer Privacy Act as amended by the CPRA (“California privacy law”).

We do not sell your personal information for money. However, some advertising/analytics technologies (such as pixels and cookies) may be considered “sharing” under California law when used to deliver targeted ads across different websites or apps.

1) How to opt out (fastest options)

A) Use our cookie preferences (recommended)

You can opt out of “sharing” by disabling Marketing/Advertising cookies in our cookie preference tool (Cookiebot). This will limit or stop third-party advertising tags/pixels from loading (where supported).

  1. Open the Cookie Settings panel on our site (Cookiebot).
  2. Turn off Marketing (and optionally Statistics).
  3. Save your choices.

B) Use Global Privacy Control (GPC), where supported

If your browser sends a Global Privacy Control (GPC) signal, we will treat it as a request to opt out of “sale/sharing” to the extent required and supported by our tools and integrations.

C) Contact us (manual request)

You can also submit an opt-out request by emailing us at contact@whiteknight.academy.

2) What information may be “shared” for advertising

Depending on your cookie settings, we may use advertising/measurement partners such as: Google (Analytics/Ads), Meta (Facebook/Instagram), TikTok, and Microsoft (Bing).

Information that may be involved can include:

  • Online identifiers (cookie IDs, advertising IDs)
  • Device and browser information
  • IP address (often in truncated or hashed form depending on settings)
  • Events on our website (e.g., page views, clicks, sign-ups, purchases)

This information is used to measure campaign performance, improve our marketing, and show more relevant ads. You can stop this “sharing” by opting out as described above.

3) Do we sell personal information?

No. We do not sell your personal information for money.

4) Do we share personal information?

We may “share” certain online identifiers and website activity data with advertising partners for cross-context behavioral advertising only where permitted and, for users in the EEA/UK, only after you provide consent through Cookiebot.

5) Your rights (California)

California residents may have the right to:

  • Opt out of the sale or sharing of personal information
  • Request access to personal information we collected about you
  • Request deletion of personal information (subject to legal exceptions)
  • Request correction of inaccurate personal information
  • Not be discriminated against for exercising privacy rights

To submit a request, email contact@whiteknight.academy with your name, the email used for your account, and the type of request. We may need to verify your identity before processing your request.

6) Authorized agents

You may designate an authorized agent to make a request on your behalf, as allowed by California law. We may require proof that the agent is authorized and verification of your identity.

7) Changes to this page

We may update this page from time to time. We will post the updated version and change the effective date above.

8) Contact

For privacy questions or requests, contact: contact@whiteknight.academy.
title: Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information
